aaynahxgth.name: Marry-me chicken one-pot rice
preparation: Fry off the chicken, onion & sundried tomatoes in a pan until softened and cooked through.
Add the garlic Italian herbs, salt + pepper.
Stir in the pesto followed by the stock and the uncooked rice.
Bring to the boil then reduce the heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until all of the liquid has been absorbed and the rice is cooked.
Stir in the cream and some basil when it’s almost cooked, then serve up!

ingredients.ingredient: Klein blikje champignon soep voor 1 persoon

agxiwihomw.name: Kip Tandoori
preparation: Snij de kip in blokjes.
En snij de ui, champignons en prei.
Kook ondertussen de rijst.
Bak in olijfolie de kip samen met de ui goudbruin.
Voeg flink wat kip tandoori kruiden toe.
Bak de prei en champignon even mee.
Voeg de Boursin toe en laat het even goed mee smelten.
Voeg de champignon soep toe en laat even 5 min sudderen op een laag pitje.
Serveer samen met de rijst, voor de liefhebber kan er nog een beetje ketjap manis overheen.

ahuoxgaiqr.name: Gnocchi alla sorrentina
preparation: Snipper de ui en snijd de knoflook fijn.
Verhit de olie in een hapjespan op middelhoog vuur en fruit de ui 3 min.
Snijd ondertussen de stelen van het basilicum grof.
Voeg de knoflook toe en fruit nog 3 min.
Voeg de passata en basilicumstelen toe en breng op smaak met peper en eventueel zout.
Laat in ca. 15 min. op laag vuur tot ⅔ inkoken.
Kook ondertussen de gnocchi volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking.
Verwarm de oven voor op 250 °C.
Snijd de mozzarella in blokjes.
Meng de gnocchi, de helft van de mozzarella en de Parmezaanse kaas door de tomatensaus en schep in de ovenschaal.
Verdeel de rest van de mozzarella en Parmezaanse kaas erover.
Bak de gnocchi alla sorrentina ca. 12 min. in de oven tot de kaas gesmolten is.
Bestrooi met de blaadjes basilicum.

aszrmzhgii.name: Romige kokosdahl met zachte aubergine
preparation: Snijd de aubergine in blokjes en bestrooi met keukenzout. Zet opzij.
Verwarm een braadpan een scheutje olijfolie en voeg hier de ui aan toe. Fruit de ui een minuut of 6 aan zodat deze glazig wordt.
Voeg de chilipeper, gember en knoflook toe en roer door.
Voeg vervolgens komijnzaad, korianderzaad, kurkuma, kerriepoeder, zout, peper en tomatenpuree toe en roer door.
Schenk vervolgens de tomaten polpa en kokosmelk in de pan. Roer door zodat het een egale massa wordt.
Voeg als laatst de linzen en het water toe en laat de dahl 20 minuten op zacht vuur pruttelen. Roer regelmatig goed door.
Knijp de aubergine uit. Verwarm een koekenpan op middelhoog vuur met een royale scheut olie en bak hier de aubergine in goudbruin. Breng op smaak met zout en peper en voeg toe aan de dahl.
Verwarm in de pan waar de aubergine in zat een klont boter en bak de naan aan beide kanten goudbruin.
Druppel eventueel wat crispy chili olie over de naan heen en snijd in stukken. Serveer de dahl met naan en koriander.

atqvvbvqsd.name: Sheet Pan Chicken Kebab with Onion, Tomato, Cucumber Pomegranate Salad and Garlic Yogurt Sauce
preparation: #For the kebabs
In a large bowl, combine minced chicken, chopped onion, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper, garlic powder, tomato paste, onion powder, cumin, and red chili flakes
Mix well until all ingredients are fully incorporated.
#Assembly and Baking
Preheat oven to 430°F (220°C).
Grease a baking sheet with oil.
Add the chicken mixture and spread evenly.
Divide into long kebab shapes using a flat surface.
Drizzle with additional oil.
Bake on the bottom rack for 10-12 minutes.
Broil on the top rack for 2 minutes on high, flip, and broil for an additional 2 minutes or until lightly golden from both sides.
Remove from oven; avoid overbaking.
#For the salad
In a separate bowl, combine cucumber, red onion, tomato, pomegranate seeds, parsley, salt, sumac, and lemon juice.
Drizzle with olive oil and mix gently.
#For the garlic yogurt sauce.
In a small bowl, mix yogurt, mayonnaise, garlic, lemon juice, salt, and parsley.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Serve chicken kebabs with naan or rice, onion, tomato, pomegranate salad and garlic yogurt sauce.

avjizmadhj.name: Mc chicken sandwich
preparation: In a mixing bowl combine minced chicken. Season with salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Mix well until combined.
Grease hands with a little bit oil and make round patties. Place them onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, and let them freeze for 30 minutes or until ready to use.
Take two dishes, divide the all purpose flour in both dishes( around 4 tbsp each).
Add salt pepper, garlic and onion powder in one bowl, Along with water to make a thick batter. Adjust water accordingly.
Heat oil in a frying pan. Once the oil is hot,
Coat the chicken patties in flour mixture then the wet batter.
Carefully drop the chicken patties into the oil. Fry on medium low for 10-15 minutes or until fully cooked and crispy golden brown.
Make sauce by combining mayo, Dijon mustard, salt pepper and vinegar in a mixing bowl.
Assemble the sandwich by adding sauce, chicken patty, lettuce and some more sauce. Serve with some fries and enjoy!

befvbuaazp.name: Tuscan Beef
preparation: Heat a drizzle of oil in a large non-stick saucepan.
Add the onion and fry for 5 minutes.
Stir in the beef mince and garlic and fry until the beef is browned.
Drain off any excess oil.
Add the smoked paprika for the final minute.
Stir in the single cream, milk and sundried tomatoes.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Gently bring to the boil, before stirring in the spinach.
Simmer on low for 3-5 minutes, stirring reguarly until the spinach has wilted and the beef is cooked through.

bizamtnavs.name: High protein red pepper pasta
preparation: Get your pasta on to boil in a pan of salty water.
In the meantime - blend the tofu, peppers, sun dried tomatoes, tomato purée, spices (see ingredients), vinegar, parmesan, salt, pepper and water until you get a completely smooth, creamy sauce.
Add an additional splash of water if needed to thin.
Transfer the sauce into a pan and warm through on a low-medium heat.
Add a splash of your pasta water to the sauce to thin further and emulsify.
Once al dente, drain your pasta and transfer it straight into the pan with your sauce.
Gently toss the pasta in the sauce until fully coated.
I like to top mine with some breadcrumbs and parsley, but do as you please!

bkiyciarhc.name: CHILLI GARLIC CHICKEN AND RICE
preparation: marinate the mushrooms in the garlic and chilli paste and curry powder then fry each side until browning, squish flat then remove from the pan.
to the pan add stock, coconut milk, soy sauce, sugar and lime juice then simmer to combine.
serve the broth over the rice, chop the mushrooms up and place ontop then garnish, serve and enjoy.

btsggshbzk.name: Chicken Fajita Sliders
preparation: Mix all of the ingredients for the seasoning into a small bowl. Set aside, we aren't ready for this just yet.
Slice Chicken Breasts thin and set aside.
Slice Onion and Bell Peppers and set aside.
Divide seasoning mixture in half and sprinkle ½ seasoning mixture on top of chicken and the other half on the sliced vegetables. Toss to coat.
Place 1 cup water in Instant Pot.
Place Chicken in Steamer Basket OR use a trivet and place a piece of tin foil on top.
Set to Manual (Pressure Cook) high for 5 Minutes. Allow a 5 Minute Natural Release (NR) and then Quick Release (QR) and open lid.
Place Sliced Vegetables on top and quickly close lid.
Set to Manual (Pressure Cook) High for 1 Minute and Quick Release (QR).
Open Lid and remove basket with Chicken Fajitas and vegetables.
Squeeze juice from 1 lime over Fajitas.
Slice Hawaiian Rolls horizontally and spread with Cilantro Lime Spread (optional).
Layer Chicken Fajitas, Vegetables and Shredded Mexican Blend Cheese and place roll tops on top.
Brush with melted butter and garlic.
Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and tops are golden brown.

ingredients.ingredient: seasonings: garlic powder, red paprika powder, smoked paprika powder, oregano

btyuyxcwae.name: Shrimp Linguine
preparation: Peel & pat dry the Argentinian shrimp, add 1 tsp of each seasoning & mix well.
Add olive oil to a pan, fry each side of the shrimp for 1-2 minutes.
Remove the shrimp, add butter & minced garlic cloves. Let the garlic simmer until golden brown.
Add the tomato sauce & heavy cream, add the shrimp back in & let this all simmer together on medium heat for 10 minutes.
Once well combined add in the seasonings.
Add the linguine pasta (make sure it’s aldente!) & the chopped parsley! Mix well & enjoy✨

bwuulgswfg.name: ASIAN-STYLE BEEF STEW
preparation: Season the beef with salt & ground black pepper.
Slice the shallots thinly. Finely chop the chilli, bash the lemongrass stalk with a rolling pin, and finely chop another lemongrass stalk (remove the tough outer part first).
Get the lime leaves (or the zest of 1 lime) and star anise, and measure the fish sauce. Make the vegetable stock from a stock cube.
Preheat oven to 150°C.
In an ovenproof dish with a lid, add the oil and heat to medium on the hob.
Add the beef and cook until it’s nicely browned. Remove the beef with a slotted spoon.
Add the shallot, chilli, and chopped lemongrass, and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the beef back in and mix everything together.
Add the stock, lime leaves, star anise, fish sauce, and whole lemongrass stalk, and stir well.
Pop the lid on and transfer to the preheated oven for 75 minutes.
Remove from the oven and add a squeeze of lime juice, then return to the oven for a further 15 minutes.
Before serving, garnish with finely chopped coriander (optional) and enjoy.

cfrfywejtl.name: AARDAPPELKROKET & CHILI CRISP HALLOUMI SALADE
preparation: Verwarm de oven voor op 220 graden.
Verdeel de aardappelkroketjes over een met bakpapier beklede bakplaat.
Snijd de halloumi in kleine blokjes en meng deze met de honing en chili olie.
Verdeel ook de blokjes halloumi over de bakplaat.
Bak dit 15-20 minuten in de oven. Hussel halverwege voorzichtig even door.
Je kan de aardappelkroketjes ook los bereiden van de halloumi in de Airfryer, dan worden ze iets knapperiger.
Snijd ondertussen de rest van de groenten en doe deze alvast in een schaal.
Serveer met de aardappelkroketjes, halloumi blokjes en dille dressing.
Maak de dressing door alle ingrediënten fijn te blenden met een staafmixer of foodprocessor.

ingredients.ingredient: stukje verse gember (geschild, geraspt, ca. 4 cm)

cftcorijuh.name: Oosterse Burger
preparation: Meng de wortel met de helft van de gember, de helft van de bosui en de helft van de woksaus.
Kneed het gehakt met de rest van de gember, bosui, woksaus, uitjes, zout en peper.
Vorm er 4 burgers van.
Verhit de wokolie in een koekenpan en bak hierin de burgers circa 5 minuten per kant. Keer regelmatig.
Snijd de broodjes open.
Schep de wortelsalade op de onderste helften en bestrooi de gebakken uitjes erover.
Leg daarop de burgers en dek af met de bovenste helften.

clltyerhje.name: Creamy Sweet Chilli Chicken
preparation: Season the chicken and fry off until it’s starting to brown.
Add in the onions and peppers and cook until soft.
Add in the garlic, tomato puree and sweet chilli sauce and cook for a few minutes.
Then add in the stock and cream cheese.
Reduce this down until it’s formed a thicker sauce.
Garnish.
Serve and enjoy.

ingredients.ingredient: spring onions chopped (retain the green parts for the topping)
chilli flakes - depending on how hot you want it

clsplazois.name: Red Thai Crispy Halloumi Noodles
preparation: Prep the halloumi: Place the cornflakes in a freezer bag and seal the top.
Roll over the flakes with a rolling pin a few times until you have an even crumb.
Place the beaten egg in one bowl and the flour in another.
Dip the halloumi in the flour, then egg then crumbs until coated.
Slice both blocks of halloumi widthways into 1cm slices.
Heat a drizzle of oil in a large non-stick frying pan.
Add the sugar snap peas and fry for 3 minutes until starting to colour. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Heat a little more oil and add the ginger, garlic and spring onions. Fry for 3 minutes, stirring regularly.
Stir in the chilli flakes and red thai curry paste and fry for one minute.
Stir in the coconut milk, stock and noodles and season with salt and pepper.
Bring to the boil and simmer on a medium to low heat for 4 minutes or until the noodles are cooked.
Whilst the noodles are cooking, Heat a drizzle of oil in a large non-stick frying pan.
Add the halloumi and fry on a medium heat for 2-3 minutes each side until golden brown and crispy.
Use tongs to divide the noodles between 4 bowls.
Pour over the sauce and finish with some finely sliced spring onion green parts, the fried sugar snap peas and the crispy halloumi slices.

ingredients.ingredient: gyoza (how many is up to you)

cpndmxswiv.name: Dumpling Noodle Salad
preparation: Cook the noodles according to packet instructions, reserving a splash of noodle water to loosen the dressing.

For the dressing, in a bowl mix add tahini + chilli oil. Whisk until combined, then add the soy, rice wine vinegar, grated ginger, garlic + lime juice. Season with red pepper flakes, then whisk to combine. Add a splash of noodle water to loosen + something sweet if needed. You want enough dressing to coat the noodles well.
Finely chop all your veggies - I used spring onion, kimchi, red pepper, tomato, cucumber + red onion.
Cook your gyoza according to packet instructions until crispy, then steam to soften.
In a large mixing bowl, add the cooked noodles, then all the chopped veggies. Add the toasted sesame seeds, then pour in the dressing + mix well.
To serve, get into bowls + top with crispy dumplings. Garnish with more spring onion, sesame seeds + chilli oil - enjoy warm or cold!

czapvowdvz.name: Caya's Linzen salade
preparation: Linzen uit spoelen.
Snijd cherrytomaatjes, avocado en zongedroogde tomaatjes.
Halve ui snipperen, halve ui in ringen.
Kruimel de feta kaas en mix.
Voeg basilicum toe.

ingredients.ingredient: a bit of More Spices Knobilicous
Some sesame seeds and/or avocado topping

czyrdvjxmk.name: Low Carb Sushi Salad
preparation: Cut the salmon into bite-sized cubes.
Season with the spices and oil spray and cook in the AirFryer at 200° for 6-8 minutes until crispy.
Meanwhile, chop the rest of the ingredients.
Add the salmon on top at the end.
#Optional toppings
Avocado topping
Sriracha mayo or sauce
Spring onions

dfylsekmpj.name: PASTA MET ROMIGE COURGETTE SAUS, CRISPY SERRANOHAM & BURRATA
preparation: Kook de pasta gaar volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking. Bewaar een kopje van het pastawater.
Verwarm de oven voor op 200 graden. Leg de serranoham op een met bakpapier beklede bakplaat en bak in ongeveer 10 minuten krokant.
Snijd de courgette in partjes. Snipper de ui en pers de knoflook.
Verhit 1 eetlepel olijfolie in een koekenpan. Fruit eerst de ui en knoflook aan, voeg daarna de courgette toe. Bak tot alles zacht is en breng op smaak met peper en zout.
Mix of pureer de courgette samen met de cottage cheese, kookroom, peper en zout tot een gladde saus.
Rooster de pijnboompitten in een droge koekenpan.
Meng de saus door de pasta. Voeg een beetje van het pastawater toe om de saus mooi romig te maken.
Serveer de pasta met burrata, krokante serranoham, geroosterde pijnboompitten, rucola en extra peper.

ingredients.ingredient: tin of crushed peeled plum tomatoes or chopped tomatoes

dnjqccytgy.name: Ragù Di Lenticchie
preparation: In a large shallow frying pan add a generous glug of extra virgin olive oil along with the diced soffritto mix (carrot, celery and onion). Cook on a medium heat for about 10 minutes.
Meanwhile finely chop the garlic and sun-dried tomatoes. Add them to the soffritto along with the chopped dry porcini mushroom and cook for another 2 minutes.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook for another minute.
Using some butcher's twine, prepare a small bouquet by tying together the rosemary, sage, and bay leaves.
Add the wine and the herbs bouquet to the pot and let it simmer for a minute or two until slightly reduced.
Reduce the heat to low and add the crushed peeled plum tomatoes or chopped tomatoes, a good pinch of salt and black pepper.
Add the lentils and about 600 ml of water and simmer gently for 40 - 50 minutes, allowing the flavours to meld together and the lentils to fully cook.
The lentils cooking time will vary depending on which lentils you use, so add more water and cook the ragù for longer if need it.
Once fully cooked, the sauce should be thick, moist and juicy.
If the sauce still has a lot of liquid, continue cooking it for longer.
If the sauce is too thick, add a splash of water to loosen it.
Discard the herbs bouquet and taste to adjust the seasoning with salt and pepper.
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add the linguine and cook until al dente.
Reserve a cup of pasta water before draining.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan with the sauce and stir well.
Add a drizzle of olive oil and if the sauce is too thick, add a splash of the reserved pasta water to loosen it.
Stir well again before serving.
Enjoy!

dnpuhknygb.name: Homemade Flatbread
preparation: Combine the yeast and honey in the tepid water and whisk until frothy.
Mix in the flour with a wooden spoon, then knead using a standing mixture or by hand for 2-3 minutes.
Add the pinch of salt and continue kneading to incorporate.
Once the dough is firm, leave in a bowl and cover with a clean tea towel. Set this aside to rise for half an hour.
Divide the dough into 8 even pieces and roll to form balls. Then leave them to rise for an additional 10 minutes.
Flatten each ball with a rolling pin to form the flatbread shapes and using your fingertips, create dimples in the dough.
Heat up a drizzle of olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat.
After a minute, add one flatbread in and cook on both sides for 2 minutes, flipping half way through.
Repeat this process with the rest of the flatbreads, making sure to add a drizzle of oil to the pan each other.
Serve warm and best enjoyed with gyros or with dips.

dqnraicnrm.name: Chicken Thigh Risotto
preparation: First, cup up the chicken thighs into bite size pieces & marinate for 1 hour or overnight.
On medium heat, add oil & fry chicken thighs for 10 minutes. Remove from pan, leave the excess oil.

In the same pan, sauté the vegetables for 10 minutes. Add in the heavy cream, rice, spices & chicken. Mix until the rice is cooked aldente, so about 10 minutes. (Add hot water if rice needs to cook more)
Finally add the chopped parsley, mix well & serve with freshly grated Parmesan if you’d like!

dtgapzpnwn.name: Sticky Lemon Pepper Chicken Tenders
preparation: If baking the tenders in the oven, preheat your oven to 180°C/ 375°F.
In a large bowl, coat the chicken tenders in the smoked paprika and 1/2 tsp of salt.
In a food processor, blend together the cornflakes, garlic pepper seasoning and 1/2 tsp of salt into fine crumb.
Beat the eggs together in a bowl, dip the chicken tenders into the egg, then coat all over in the cornflake crumb.
Place the tenders on a lined baking tray and bake for 15 minutes. Alternatively, air fry at 190°C/ 400°F for 12 minutes.
#For the Sticky Lemon Pepper Sauce
Meanwhile, mix together the Sticky Lemon Pepper sauce in a bowl.
Heat the sauce in a small saucepan, on medium heat, until it bubbles and becomes thick, then remove from the heat.
Once the chicken tenders are baked, dip them in the Sticky Lemon Pepper sauce, we recommend dipping one at a time as you eat them, so they stay super crunchy!

dvlxoqrexl.name: Creamy Gyoza Soup
preparation: Fry off the garlic, Pak choy and mushrooms in some oil for 5 mins.
Add in the red Thai curry paste, stir to combine. Then go in with 300ml stock and the cream. Bring to a boil, season to your taste then lower the heat to a simmer and cover with a lid.

Whilst that’s blipping away add some oil to a pan, fry the gyoza for 3-4 mins over a medium heat until the bottoms are crispy. Pour in a small amount of stock and cover with a lid, cook for 5 mins or until most of the liquid has dissolved.
Add your noodles to the soup and cook to packet instructions.
Serve up your soup with the noodles, top with the gyoza and sesame seeds and chilli oil which is optional and enjoy!

dyonmjzydk.name: Perfect Tomato and Mozzarella Linguini
preparation: IS THIS CORRECT?
Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil, add the linguini and cook according to packet instructions until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat a large frying pan over a medium heat and add a generous amount of olive oil. Once hot, add the sliced garlic and fry for a couple of minutes until golden brown.
Add the tomatoes and cook for 4-5 minutes until softened. Season with a good pinch of salt and pepper.

echqmdssmq.name: Thai Basil Chicken - Pad Kra Pao
preparation: Mix all sauce ingredients and set aside.
In a wok or skillet add 2-3 tablespoons oil and sauté shallot or onion, garlic and jalapeno. Cook 1 minute without burning.
Add in ground chicken and cook just until no longer pink. Do NOT overcook and dry out chicken. Add oil if it looks dry. Should be a bit juicy/saucey from chicken and oil.
Stir the sauce and add the sauce to the chicken.
Cook until everything is incorporated. Turn off the heat.
Add the fresh basil and stir then add red chile and a squeeze of lime.
Serve over rice.
Garnish with more fresh basil, lime and sesame seeds and sliced green onion and a fried egg.

ejqtapgkho.name: one-pan dumplings
preparation: Mix your “sauce” ingredients together in a large dish and whisk until well combined.
Add in your bok choy and spread out evenly.
Add your dumplings on top of the sauce.
Bake in the oven for 25 minutes on 180*C, flipping halfway and spooning the sauce over the dumplings.
Top with chilli oil, sesame seeds and spring onion.

ingredients.ingredient: chipotle peppers from a can with adobo sauce
maple syrup (or any sweetener you like)

erumcftivk.name: Chili Lime Chickpea Cauliflower Wrap
preparation: Quick Pickled Onions:
Thinly slice 1/2 medium red onion.
Grate 1 clove of garlic.
Zest and juice 1/2 a lime.
Mix together the red wine vinegar, maple syrup, and minced cilantro.
Add the thinly sliced red onion, grated garlic, lime zest and juice to the vinegar mixture.
Season with kosher salt and set aside for at least 30 minutes.
Roasted Cauliflower and Chickpeas:
Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Cut the small head of cauliflower into 1 inch pieces.
In a bowl, combine the cauliflower, drained and rinsed chickpeas, garlic powder, ground coriander, onion powder, dry thyme, and avocado oil.
Spread the mixture onto a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy.
Chipotle Yogurt Sauce:
In a blender, combine the chipotle peppers, unsweetened plant-based yogurt, vegan mayo, lime juice and zest, maple syrup, grated garlic, and minced cilantro.
Blend until smooth, adding water if needed to reach desired consistency.
Assembly:
Warm the whole grain pitas.
Spread a layer of chipotle yogurt sauce on each pita.
Top with the roasted cauliflower and chickpeas, quick pickled onions, and lettuce.
Fold the pitas and serve.

ingredients.ingredient: slices of ham fried in butter

evnhrcphni.name: ONE PAN EGG SANDWICH
preparation: Cook the slices of ham in butter in a frying pan on a medium heat.
Layer the Gouda slices on top of the ham.
Mix the two eggs with some seasoning, salt, and pepper.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and cook until set.
Toast the ciabatta and spread mayo mixed with dijon mustard on it.
Assemble the sandwich with the cooked egg, grated cheddar, avocado, and Sriracha.

fiasltgbcn.name: Crispy rice salad
preparation: Cook the rice as per packet instructions. Once cooled, mix with red thai paste and sesame seed oil.
Spread this flat on a lined baking tray and bake in the oven at 200C for 30mins, mixing half way through.
Mix together the dressing ingredients.
Smashed the cucumber then chop into small chunks.
Finely slice the spring onions, mint, coriander and chilli and add to a large bowl along with the peanuts.
Top with the crispy rice and the dressing, mix and eat straight away.

ingredients.ingredient: Enough small firm courgettes, sliced 1/2 cm coins
grated pecorino or use Parmesan, plus extra to serve
Pinch of chilli flakes, to taste

ftxapduvlc.name: Courgettes with Breadcrumbs and Pecorino
preparation: Mix everything in a bowl, minus lemon juice.
Thread onto skewers.
Roast in hot oven 210C until softened & burnished.
I also gave mine a quick flash under very hot grill to give extra colour / crunch to the breadcrumbs.
Remove from oven & squeeze over with lemon juice, and extra olive oil to serve.
Threading the courgettes on the skewer creates space for hot air to circulate courgettes, intensifying flavours, in a good way.

gcigxtstsw.name: French Onion Soup & Mini Meatballs Pasta
preparation: Make the mini meatballs by first combining half the breadcrumbs with the milk and letting them sit for 5 minutes.
You can slice the onions in the meantime.
Combine the soaked breadcrumbs with the turkey meat, the rest of the breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, onion powder, garlic powder, thyme and the egg.
Form 1” meatballs.
Heat the olive oil in the Dutch oven and add the meatballs.
Brown on both sides and then remove from the pot.
Lower the heat.
Melt the butter in the pot and add the onions.
Stir occasionally and cook for 20 minutes until browned and caramelized.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the white wine and cook until evaporated then add in the pasta, thyme, Worcestershire, and beef bone broth.
Bring the pot to a simmer and then add in the meatballs.
Cover and simmer for about 15 minutes until the pasta is cooked through.
Stir in the half & half and cook for another couple minutes.
I like to transfer mine to a shallower baking dish but you can keep it in the same pot if you like.
Add the shredded cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes until cheese is bubbly.
Serve with fresh thyme and some cheesy crostinis on the side to dip!

ingredients.ingredient: Portion of your favourite instant noodles

gcztdwiohj.name: 10 minute ramen
preparation: Cook noodles to packet instructions.
Whilst they’re boiling add Soy sauce, Sesame oil, teriyaki, Mirin and maple syrup to a bowl alongside a good splash of the boiling noodle stock.
Mix thoroughly.
Fill up with remaining stock from noodles.
Serve up with noodles and toppings.

ingredients.ingredient: Water as needed to thin as needed

goanikqtlu.name: Sriracha Honey-Lime Quinoa Salad
preparation: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, frozen edamame, chopped red cabbage, grated carrots, diced red bell pepper, and minced scallion greens.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the lime juice and zest, neutral oil, honey, sriracha, peanut oil, and salt.
Pour the dressing over the salad and mix well to combine.
Adjust the consistency with water as needed.

habejjkahu.name: COCONUT LIME TOFU
preparation: Gently heat 1-2 tbsp of sesame oil/ any oil of choice in a pan.
Pan-fry silken-firm/ firm tofu slices until golden brown on both sides (flipping half way).
Optional: coat the tofu slices lightly in corn flour for a more crisp and golden texture.
If using silken-firm tofu, it is recommended to wrap the block between kitchen towels (placing a small saucepan on top).
Let it sit for 10-15 minutes or so to drain out the excess water.
Then pat tofu dry with clean kitchen towels and slice it.
Remove the tofu and set aside.
In the same pan, stir in 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1/2 onion, sliced, 3-4 cloves of garlic, minced, Knob of ginger, grated, 1-2 tbsp red curry paste, and 1-2 tbsp sriracha/ hot sauce.
Stir it together and once fragrant, add 250-300 ml coconut milk.
Then stir in 1-2 tsp brown sugar, 1-2 tbsp light soy sauce, and Juice of 1/2 - 1 lemon or lime.
Once simmering, add back your cooked tofu.
Garnish with scallions & sesame seeds, serve over rice and DIVE IN.

ingredients.ingredient: light sour cream or greek yoghurt
dash of Garlic powder, lemon juice & salt to taste

hfrxqkexyw.name: Sweet Potato Burrito Bowls
preparation: Prepare the Pico by adding all ingredients to a bowl and mixing.
Do the same with the guacamole. Store both in the fridge.
Meanwhile dice the potatoes into small cubes.
Put them in a large bowl and drizzle with 1/2 tbs of olive oil and 1 tbs of the taco seasoning.
Mix till well combined then place in the air-fryer for approximately 18 minutes. Give a quick mix half way through.
While the potatoes are cooking, prep your ground beef.
Add to a large pan with a drizzle of olive oil over medium-high heat.
Break up the mince then add in remaining taco seasoning.
Mix and add more as needed. Optional to add a little water or stock for extra moisture.
Cook for 8-10 minutes stirring frequently until cooked to your liking.
Remove potatoes from the air fryer and let cool for a few minutes.
Assemble your bowl with sweet potato, taco mince, cheese (melt it), chopped lettuce, pico (or chopped tomato & onion), guacamole and sour cream.
For extra yums try a drizzle of Nandos perinaise sauce.
Enjoy 🥰

hjelfyzmwy.name: Zozzona
preparation: Heat the guanciale on LOW until the fat renders and it gets a little crispy.
With the fat still in the pan, remove the guanciale and brown the sausage, the onions, red pepper flakes, and tomato puree.
Start cooking the pasta, and in a separate metal bowl, combine the eggs, cheese, pepper and a ladle of starchy pasta water.
When the pasta is done, combine everything in the metal bowl and stir constantly over the heat of the pasta water.
Stir till the eggs thicken and the sauce is creamy.
Then add a splash of pasta water to achieve your final desired sauciness.

hscklsvvmw.name: Airfryer: Crunchy Soy Lemon Chicken
preparation: Kook de rijst volgens de verpakking en verkruimel de cornflakes tot kleinere stukjes.
Haal de kippendijen eerst door de bloem, vervolgens door het losgeklopte ei en als laatste door de verkruimelde cornflakes.
Leg de kippendijen in de airfryer en bak ze 15 minuten op 200°C. Bespray of besprenkel ze met wat olie en draai de kip halverwege om.
Meng alle ingrediënten voor de saus in een pan en laat deze op middelhoog vuur indikken. Zorg dat de saus niet te lang op het vuur blijft om verbranden van de suikers te voorkomen.
Snijd alle groenten voor de salade. Meng ze met een scheut olijfolie, ponzu, ongeveer 1 el mirin en wat sesamzaadjes. Als je geen ponzu hebt, voeg dan de sojasaus toe en een klein beetje citroensap.
Zodra de kip klaar is, haal je deze door de saus.
Serveer de kip met de rijst en de salade.

hwicentimz.name: Quick kecap chicken
preparation: Slice the chicken into cubes and mix in a bowl with the soy sauce, kecap manis, lime juice, grated garlic, grated ginger and honey.
Let marinate as long as you desire (cooking directly is also fine).
Fry the chicken down in a pan with oil until nice and caramelized.
Chop the green onion into coarse chucks and throw them in, cook until the chicken is ready.
Serve with white rice and grilled veggies on the side.

ingredients.ingredient: boter, verse peterselie, peper en zout

icighwgkpu.name: Paddenstoelensoep
preparation: Borstel de paddenstoelen schoon en snij in plakjes.
Verhit een beetje boter in een ruime pan en fruit de ui en knoflook even aan.
Bak dan de paddenstoelen mee samen met de tijm.
Als ze bijna gaar zijn voeg je de bloem toe.
Bak even kort mee en schenk dan de bouillon erbij.
Breng aan de kook en als het kookt roer je de room erdoor.
Laat de soep een klein half uurtje pruttelen en breng op smaak met peper en zout.
Verwarm ondertussen de oven voor op 220 graden boven- en onderwarmte.
Vis de takjes van de tijm uit de soep.
Schenk de soep in hittebestendige kom, bestrijk de randen van de kom met het ei, leg het bladerdeeg eroverheen.
Bestrijk de bladerdeegdakjes met de rest van het ei en strooi er wat sesamzaadjes (of een mix van sesam/ maanzaadjes), tijm en/of Parmezaanse kaas over en bak in 8-10 min gaar en goudbruin.
Serveer direct, eet smakelijk!

ieetjrqbbq.name: Creamy Feta and Roasted Red Pepper Chicken and Cauliflower
preparation: Heat a large pot over medium heat with olive oil.
Add onions and garlic and sauté for 3 minutes.
Add cauliflower, red peppers, chicken, seasonings, and broth.
Add more broth as needed until everything is fully covered.
Bring to a simmer; cover with a lid and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through to 165F.
Remove chicken and shred with forks.
Return chicken to pot along with spinach, feta, cream cheese, and lemon juice.
Simmer for 5-10 more minutes to allow liquid to thicken a bit.
Serve with fresh pita or bread and enjoy!

igbwmzvfib.name: MEXICAN ORZO
preparation: Prepare the vegetables: Peel and dice the onion - Peel and mince the garlic - Deseed and slice the red pepper - Drain and rinse the beans

For the orzo: Boil the kettle - Heat 2 tbsp oil In a large frying pan over medium heat - add the onion and a big pinch of salt - saute for 6-7 minutes - Add the garlic, cumin, paprika and coriander fry for a moment to release the delicious flavour - add the sliced red pepper, tomato puree, chipotle paste and sweetcorn - Mix well and cook for a minute - stir through the orzo, vegetable stock cube and 700ml boiling water - Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 8 minutes, until the orzo is soft and tender
Finish the orzo: When nearly all of the water is nearly absorbed and the pasta is cooked, swirl through the coconut yoghurt and sprinkle with freshly chopped coriander before serving.

ingredients.ingredient: neutrale olie om in te bakken
optioneel: klein handje fijngehakte bieslook en/of geroosterde sesamzaadjes

ihayzwpbbd.name: KOOLFRITTERS MET GOCHUJANG MAYO
preparation: Hak de shiitake paddenstoelen fijn.
Verhit 1 el neutrale olie in een pan en bak hier de fijngehakte shiitake in voor ongeveer 5 minuten.
Voeg op het eind 2 el sojasaus toe aan de shiitake en laat deze even afkoelen.
Bereid ondertussen de rest van de groenten voor.
Doe alle groenten in een diepe kom en schep hier de gebaken shiitake bij.
Doe vervolgens nog 2 el sojasaus, geraspte gember en sesamolie bij de groenten.
Doe tot slot het kikkererwtenmeel en koude water bij de groenten en schep dit met een lepel of pannenlikker door tot een samenhangend beslag.
Verhit een laagje olie in een grote koekenpan op medium vuur.
Schep per fritter 1 el van het beslag in de pan en frituur deze 1-2 minuten aan elke zijde.
Laat ze hierna even uitlekken op wat keukenpapier.
Herhaal dit tot je alle fritters hebt gebakken.
Zorg dat er genoeg olie in de pan blijft zitten, vul deze af en toe wat bij.
Serveer de fritters met de gochujang mayo.
Tip: mocht je ze overhouden – ze zijn heerlijk als je ze de volgende dag even oppiept in de oven of Airfryer!

iqojrfzoiu.name: Turkse Beyti
preparation: Snijd de ui fijn in kleine stukken & snijd de rode peper en peterselie heel fijn. Rasp de knoflook.
Vervolgens meng je alle bovenstaande ingrediënten voor de gehaktvulling met elkaar tot een geheel (voeg minder/meer kruiden toe naar smaak).
Meng in een kommetje en zonnebloemolie, tomaten Heinz frito tot een geheel. Hier ga je de filodeeg mee insmeren.
Smeer het mengsel d.m.v. een kwastje erop, laat geen kale plekken achter.
Verdeel de köfte onderaan en rol het op. Snijd in stukken en doe het op een ovenschaal.
Smeer de beyti in met een mengsel van zonnebloemolie en roomboter. Doe het daarna in een voorverwarmde oven op 180 graden voor ongeveer 10 á 15 minuten.Of tot het filodeeg goudbruin is.

Terwijl de beyti in de oven is: smelt de boter in een klein pannetje en voeg er tomatenpuree aan toe, indien nodig ook een beetje gekookt water (als het niet waterig wordt). Daarna kun je er zout naar smaak aan toevoegen.
Als de beyti uit de oven is, kan je beginnen met serveren.
Verdeel de stukjes beyti over een bord, doe daarover het tomatensausje en serveer met yoghurt.
Nog een tip: gril tomaten en groene Turkse pepers voor ernaast! & natuurlijk de Turkse rijst. Eetsmakelijk!!

itnpdafcad.name: Champignonragout
preparation: Verhit een beetje olie in de pan, fruit de ui en knoflook even aan en voeg dan de champignons toe.
Bak de champignons mee tot ze gaar zijn.
Doe de boter erbij en voeg zodra deze gesmolten is ook de bloem toe.
Bak even mee en doe dan de bouillon erbij, roer het geheel door.
Voeg de Boursin truffelsmaak toe en meng tot deze gesmolten is.
Laat even zachtjes pruttelen zodat de ragout mooi indikt.
Breng op smaak met zwarte peper en eventueel een beetje tijm.
Serveer de ragout in de pasteibakjes en geniet ervan!

iytdpypvvs.name: Cod puttanesca
preparation: 1. Slice the shallot and garlic into thin (half) rings and finely chop the stems of the parsley.
2. Let all of this melt in a pan with the anchovy, capers and olives.
3. Add the halfed cherry tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, chili flakes, lemon zest and pepper. Simmer.
4. Put the cod into the sauce and season with lemon zest and pepper.
5. In the meantime cook the pasta al dente.
6. Remove the cod and add the pasta with pasta water and lemon juice to the sauce, mix well.
7. Serve the pasta with the cod and top with parsley and lemon zest.

ingredients.ingredient: chilli straight to wok (or regular flavour)

izchygvkdf.name: Higher Protein and much lower calorie Chicken Chow Mein

jeysqkzhev.name: Sticky chili crisp chicken wraps
preparation: Slice the chicken into cubes and add to a pan with the chili crisp, paprika, onion, garlic, salt and pepper.
Give some nice color together with the whites of the spring onion.
When almost cooked through add the sriracha, soy sauce, honey and lime juice.
Heat to thicken and cook the chicken.
Give the mini wraps a good char and finely mince the greens of spring onions.
Assemble with the avocado spread, chicken, spring onion and more lime juice.
#For the avocado spread
Mash the avocado together with the grated garlic and other ingredients.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.

ingredients.ingredient: short grain or sushi rice, dry weight
Salt, pepper, garlic powder to taste

jfycvwevfd.name: Honey Teriyaki Chicken & Rice
preparation: Mix cornstarch and cold water in a small bowl, then add after chicken is done and let sit uncovered for 15-20 mins.
You can add the cornstarch slurry before cooking, but it's recommended to add it at the end to assess the need for thickening.
Cook the chicken on high for 4-5 hours or on low for 5+ hours.
Prepare the rice according to package instructions.
For the Low-Cal Yum Yum Sauce, combine low-fat mayo, greek yogurt, sriracha, and season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder to taste.
Add milk as needed for desired consistency.

ingredients.ingredient: koriander steeltjes gehakt en blaadjes fijngesneden

jmobbyifzj.name: Martijn's Thaise curry met kikkererwten
preparation: Snijd de ui in ringen, de waspenen in plakjes en de aubergine in blokjes van ongeveer 2 cm.
Snijd ook de tomaten in parten en spoel de kikkererwten af en laat ze uitlekken.
Verhit in een hapjespan de zonnebloemolie en bak de ui, aubergine in ongeveer 5 minuten omscheppend op halfhoog vuur zacht.
Voeg de currypasta toe en bak 2 minuten mee.
Haal intussen de blaadjes van de koriandersteeltjes en voeg deze samen met de tomaat en wortel toe aan de pan.
Voeg de kokosmelk toe aan het gerecht en vervolgens de kikkererwten.
Voeg nu de rijst en bouillon toe en laat de rijst in ongeveer 10 minuten garen.
De saus moet iets dikker worden.
Serveer in een kom, schep de yoghurt erop en bestrooi met wat extra korianderblaadjes.

jtkxvtyuro.name: CHIPOTLE TOFU TACOS
preparation: Preheat the oven to 220°C.
Add the diced radish and red onion to a shallow bowl and cover with the lime juice. Leave to one side to marinade.
Mix together the chipotle paste, maple syrup and oil together with a splash of water to loosen.

Pat the tofu dry. Peel the into thin strips using a potato peeler. Save any unusable tofu or crumbles for scrambled tofu. Spread the strips over two large lined baking trays. Brush the tofu with the chipotle marinade on both sides. Keep an eye on it and bake for 220°C for around 10 minutes (will vary depending on your oven) or until crispy and golden. The tofu will crisp up more as it cools so as soon as it’s looking golden, remove from the oven.
While the tofu is cooking, blend together all of the ingredients for the pea puree and season to taste with more salt/lime juice as needed.
Mix together the ingredients for the garlic sauce.
Warm the corn tacos in a pan. Layer up each taco with pea puree, crispy tofu, radish salsa and garlic yoghurt. Sprinkle with coriander and green chilli and finish with a squeeze of lime. Enjoy! 💛

ingredients.ingredient: bag frozen fully cooked edamame, thawed
sesame seeds, plus additional to taste (optional)

kfdcphegxe.name: Bulgogi Bean Salad with Scallion-Ginger Dressing

kgnxdkyrub.name: spicy ‘salmon’ poke bowl
preparation: Mix together the sugar and mirin with a pinch of salt.
Add in your cucumbers, toss to coat and set aside.
In a medium bowl, mash the chickpeas until smooth with a few lumps remaining.
Add in the other ingredients (incl. 3 crumbled mini nori sheets or 1/2 tbsp furikake) and mix well.
Check the flavour, adding more sweetness, citrus or spice as desired.
Add to a bowl along with your sticky rice and veggies.
Finish with a drizzle of either kewpie mayo or a sriracha mayo mix.

knpmvtqvir.name: Curried Gyoza Laksa
preparation: Dice the shallot, mince the garlic + ginger, then fry in sesame oil until fragrant (5 mins)
Add the laksa paste, and cook out for 5 mins.
Add the dried spices + cook for a further minute.
Pour in the coconut milk + simmer for 5 mins.
For extra flavour, mix the miso, peanut butter, tamarind, gochujang + soy sauce, then add.
Season with the juice of a lime, 1 tbsp sugar + a crack of black pepper. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Cook the veg in the broth until tender, then add the vegetable fusion gyoza + cook for 2-3 minutes.
Prepare the rice noodles + garnishes
Place the noodles in a bowl, cover in the laksa broth, then top with the gyoza + greens.
Finish with the garnishes + enjoy!

ktbajpqxay.name: Pasta alla norcina
preparation: Add olive oil into a pan and break up the sausages. Caramelize them on all sides.
Boil the pasta in salted water until al dente.
Make slices of the garlic and add to the sausage pan together with the fennel seeds and chili flakes. Fry down for a few minutes.
Deglaze the pan with white wine and let it evaporate. Go in with the cream and let it simmer on low.
Grate the pecorino on the finest setting. Add the pasta with some pasta water to the sausage pan and mix well. Turn off the heat and stir in almost all the cheese.
Serve with black pepper and the rest of the cheese, enjoy!

lgntuwberv.name: HARISSA GLAZED ROAST POTATOES
preparation: Peel the potatoes, then slice any large potatoes into halves or quarters.
Add the potatoes to a large saucepan of cold water, bring to a boil and boil for 7-8 minutes or until soft on the outside.
Then drain and add them back to the saucepan.
Shake the saucepan to fluff up the outsides, then leave to cool for 10-15 minutes.
Add a generous glug of olive oil to a roasting tray and place it on an oven shelf.
Preheat the oven to 200°C fan / 425°F.
When the oven is ready, remove the tray and carefully drop the par-boiled potatoes onto the hot oil in the tray.
Sprinkle with a generous pinch of salt, then mix.
Roast for 45-55 minutes or until golden and crispy, turning halfway.
When the potatoes are nearly ready, add a splash of olive oil to a large pan on a medium heat.
Add the garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes or until it begins to turn golden.
Stir in the harissa paste and maple syrup, then cook for 2-3 minutes or until the sauce begins to thicken.
Add the roast potatoes to the pan and stir them into the harissa glaze, until all the potatoes are covered in the glaze, then remove the pan from the heat.
To serve, spoon the yoghurt over a large serving plate.
Top with the harissa glazed roast potatoes, followed by the coriander leaves and a big pinch of salt.
Drizzle over any sauce left in the pan, then squeeze over juice from the lemon wedges.

lhjznvlwmn.name: Coconut Lime Tofu
preparation: Gently heat 1-2 tbsp of sesame oil/ any oil of choice in a pan.
Pan-fry silken-firm/ firm tofu slices until golden brown on both sides (flipping half way).
Optional: coat the tofu slices lightly in corn flour for a more crisp and golden texture.
If using silken-firm tofu, it is recommended to wrap the block between kitchen towels (placing a small saucepan on top).
Let it sit for 10-15 minutes or so to drain out the excess water.
Then pat tofu dry with clean kitchen towels and slice it.
Remove the tofu and set aside.
In the same pan, stir in 1 tbsp sesame oil, 1/2 onion, sliced, 3-4 cloves of garlic, minced, knob of ginger, grated, 1-2 tbsp red curry paste, and 1-2 tbsp sriracha/ hot sauce.
Stir it together and once fragrant, add 250-300 ml coconut milk.
Then stir in 1-2 tsp brown sugar, 1-2 tbsp light soy sauce, and juice of 1/2 - 1 lemon or lime (adjust according to preference, adding more for zing).
Once simmering, add back your cooked tofu.
Garnish with scallions & sesame seeds, serve over rice and DIVE IN.

liwxdvbfqs.name: Snelle curry met rijst en halloumi
preparation: Kook de rijst volgens de verpakking
Snipper de ui. Verwarm een hapjespan of grote koekenpan op middelhoog vuur. Fruit de ui tot deze glazig is.
Voeg de tomatenpuree, de komijn en het paprikapoeder toe en bak een minuut op zacht vuur.

Voeg dan de tomaten uit blik toe. Vul het blik met water en voeg dat ook toe. Halveer de cherrytomaatjes en voeg deze ook toe. Breng aan de kook, zet het vuur laag en laat de tomaten ongeveer 10 minuutjes pruttelen.
Voeg dan hand voor hand de spinazie toe en laat deze steeds slinken.
Voeg de kookroom toe als alle spinazie is geslonken. Laat zachtjes pruttelen en breng de saus op smaak met peper en zout.
Snijd de halloumi in kleine blokjes. Voeg ze toe aan de curry en warm ze kort op.
Serveer de curry met warme naan.

ljfziohwhj.name: Cheesy Red Pesto Beef Pasta
preparation: Pop your pasta on to boil with a good amount of salt.
Meanwhile season and cook the beef until browned then add in the onion.
Cook until the onion is soft then add in the garlic, tomato purée and the pesto and cook for a minute or so.
Then add the stock and cream cheese, turn up the heat a little and allow to reduce down.
Once the pasta is done, drain and pop into the sauce adding a little pasta water.
Give it a good mix and top with grated cheese and pop it under the grill or in the oven until golden and bubbling.
Garnish.
Serve and enjoy.

ingredients.ingredient: salt, onion powder, garlic powder + paprika

lmzsqiorvb.name: One Pan Chicken and Cabbage
preparation: Cut your chicken into small pieces.
Season them generously with salt, onion powder and garlic powder.
In a large deep skillet, heat the oil.
Once hot, add in the chicken and cook for 6 minutes – or until browned on both sides.
Next add in the onion and saute for 2 minutes.
Stir in the garlic for 30 seconds and then the tomato paste too.
Next mix in the cabbage shreds for a minute or two until coated and slightly wilted down, then mix in the carrot shreds and then finally add in the broth and seasonings.
Bring to a simmer and lower the heat to continue the simmer cook, stirring occasionaly, for about 10-15 minutes or until the liquid has evaporated.
Top with parsley and enjoy!

lnqcpcssbc.name: 15 Minute, Sausage, Chorizo, Sun Dried Tomato and Mozzarella Pasta
preparation: Pop the pasta into boiling water with a good amount of salt.
Whilst this is cooking fry off the chorizo until it’s starting to go crispy and the oils have come out, then remove from the pan.
Add in the sausages and break them down, cooking until crispy.
Then add in the garlic and sun dried tomato paste. Cook that for a few minutes and then add in the stock and cream cheese.
Mix well and cook until the sauce has thickened.
Then add in the mozzarella and the cooked pasta. Mix together adding pasta water until you get the perfect consistency.
Garnish with the crispy chorizo and fresh parsley. Serve and enjoy.

lqvurpjknl.name: Pasta pesto met een chili lemon chicken
preparation: Begin met het maken van de pesto door de knoflook met wat zout fijn te malen in een vijzel.
Voeg vervolgens de pistache noten en basilicum toe en stamp weer tot fijn.
Voeg tot slot de parmezaanse kaas, olijfolie en nog wat peper toe en roer door.
Snij de courgette in kwart schijfjes en de zongedroogde tomaten in reepjes.
Bak de kipfilet op smaak gemaakt met zout en chili vlokken goudbruin in wat roomboter (circa 5 minuten per kant op middel laag vuur) blus af met het sap van 1 citroen en haal uit de pan.
Kook ondertussen de pasta gaar.
Haal een doekje door de bak pan en fruit de courgette en tomaten aan in wat olijfolie met wat peper en zout.
Voeg na 5 minuten de pasta aan de groenten toe samen met een lepel pasta water.
Voeg ook de pesto toe en roer door.
Serveer met de kipfilet bovenop samen met wat fijngesneden pistache noten en parmezaanse kaas.

lyjovdflut.name: Jord's Prei, Broccoli & Gnocchi
preparation: Snijd de broccoli in roosjes en de preien in ringen.
Kook de broccoli 15-20 minuten gaar in een pan met heet water.
Mix in een kom de créme fraîche met de mosterd. Roer goed door tot er een gladde mosterd pasta is ontstaan.
Rooster de pijnboompitjes en macademia noten op laag vuur, regelmatig keren. Rooster tot er een mooi bruin laagje is ontstaan (zorg dat het niet zwart wordt).
Bak ondertussen de preien in een hapjespan met 1,5 el olie tot de ringen mooi loslaten. Blijf goed roerbakken.
Voeg in een braadpan een dikke laag olie toe. Zet het vuur hoog op. Frituur de Gnocchi in de pan 7-10 minuten totdat ze mooi goudbruin of knapperig zijn. Regelmatig scheppen.
Voeg voor extra smaak bij de olie ook nog braadboter toe.
Sommige gnocchi worden niet goudbruin, maar zijn goed wanneer ze goed knapperig zijn. Ligt aan het soort gnocchi wat je hebt.
Giet de Broccoli af en voeg deze samen met de mosterd pasta toe bij de prei. Zet het vuur laag op met een deksel zodat hij goed warm wordt.
Wanneer de gnocchi klaar is, giet de olie uit de pan in de gootsteen.

ingredients.ingredient: light brown sugar, spooned and leveled

madhksqlqh.name: Brown butter Brookies
preparation: Preheat oven to 350 F. Line an 8 *8 inch pan with parchment paper.

Prepare the cookie layer: Mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside. Combine melted butter, brown and granulated sugar, egg, and vanilla. Whisk until smooth and fluffy for about 2-3 min. Add dry ingredients and chocolate chips. Mix until just combined.

Prepare the brownie layer: The browned butter mixture: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Stir every 10 seconds until foamy (6-8 minutes). Continue until milk solids turn golden brown and smell nutty. Transfer to a heatproof bowl. Add cocoa powder, oil, vanilla, and chopped chocolate; mix until smooth.

In a separate bowl Whisk 3 eggs and light brown sugar for 5-6 minutes until dissolved. Add powdered sugar; mix 1-2 minutes until combined. Add cooled browned butter mixture; mix until smooth. Add flour and chocolate chips; mix until well combined.
Note: Dissolving sugar in eggs ensures a crackly top.
Layer the cookie and brownie batters in the prepared pan.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until the edges are golden and they’re only slightly jiggly from center.( they will set completely once cooled )
Let cool completely before cutting into brookies.
You can adjust the layering to your preference, either by layering the cookie dough on top of the brownie batter or vice versa.

mewtcviubp.name: Flatbread kip-kebab met cheddar, rode ui & pittige knoflooksaus
preparation: Snijd de verse bieslook in kleine stukjes.
Maak de knoflooksaus door alle ingrediënten met elkaar te mengen.
Snijd ook de rode ui in dunne ringen.
Verhit 1 tl olijfolie in een koekenpan en fruit de ui 3 minuten aan.
Voeg dan de kip kebab flakes toe en warm even mee op.
Beleg 1 flatbread met 1 plakje cheddar.
Vouw dicht en grill even in een tosti- of grill-ijzer, broodrooster, in de pan of oven.
Leg de flatbreads op een bord en vouw ze open.
Beleg ze met ijsbergsla, de kip kebab flakes en maak af met de knoflooksaus.

ingredients.ingredient: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

mmgecmzybo.name: Leek Miso and Lemon Ditalini
preparation: Cook leek
Meanwhile, heat the butter and olive oil in a large frying pan over a medium heat.
Add the leek, garlic, chilli flakes and a pinch of salt, then cook with the lid on, but stirring occasionally for 12-15 minutes until soft and beginning to take on a little colour.
Combine
Stir in the miso paste and pasta and toast for a minute or two.
Add in the vegetable stock and bring to a simmer.
Cook with the lid off until the pasta is al dente, adding a little more water if it reduces too quickly.
Stir in the lemon juice.
Taste and season with salt, pepper or more lemon.
Serve
Divide the pasta between bowls and sprinkle over the lemon zest and more chilli flakes.
Serve.
Suggestion: Stir through a tin of chickpeas for a bit of protein and texture.

mperijkqef.name: Fresh soba and cucumber salad with tofu crumbles
preparation: Get the tofu out the packet, drain and give it a good squeeze, wrapped in kitchen paper, to absorb any excess water.
In a medium bowl, crumble the tofu into small pieces with your hands.

Heat a non stick pan with sesame or a light oil, for frying, then add the crumbles to the pan with a small pinch of salt and fry, moving regularly, for 6-7 mins until the tofu starts to crisp and turn a light/medium shade of yellow.

Add the tamari, fry until the liquid has absorbed, then clear a space in the centre, add a little more oil, heat it, then add the ginger and garlic and fry 3-4 mins more, until the raw aroma has subsided.
Season to taste, adding more tamari if you think it needs more salt.

Cook the noodles according to the packet instructions, give them a really good rinse in cold water, then gently toss in some toasted sesame oil (so they don’t stick together) and set aside in a bowl until ready to combine.
In a small mixing bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients.
Julienne or finely slice the cucumber, then in a large mixing bowl, toss the cucumber, noodles and dressing together.
Divide into bowls and add the tofu crumbles, chilli oil and fresh basil on top.

mpxgeuuups.name: Caramelised leek and miso risotto
preparation: Heat a big glug of oil in a deep pan.
Add your sliced leeks with a hefty pinch of salt and cook them on medium heat until they’re soft and caramelised—about 10 minutes.
Stir occasionally to avoid any burning, then toss in your garlic.
Add in the risotto rice and toast it for 2 minutes.
Pour in your white wine and allow to reduce slightly.
Pop in your stock cube, miso paste, and 200ml of hot water.
Stir until the stock is dissolved and the miso is mixed through.
Gradually add the rest of the hot water, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until the risotto is creamy and the rice has a slight bite.
Stir in your butter, double cream, and a generous crack of black pepper.
Squeeze in the lemon juice and add the zest for that zingy freshness.
Toss in most of the chives, saving a little for garnish.
Pile your risotto into bowls, sprinkle with the remaining chives, and maybe an extra grind of black pepper.

ingredients.ingredient: avocado, cilantro, and limes for serving

ndosfvcqna.name: Sheet Pan Crispy Jalapeño Chicken Tacos
preparation: Preheat the oven to 425° F.

On a baking sheet, toss the chicken with olive oil, onions, chipotle, chili powder, oregano, and cumin. Pour over the tamari and honey. Toss to coat. Arrange in a single layer. Add the garlic cloves, jalapeño, and green onions (for the salsa). Roast everything for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked.
Remove the garlic cloves, jalapeño, and green onions from the sheet pan and add to a food processor. Let cool.
Shred the chicken and toss with the sauce on the sheet pan.
Line the taco shells up in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Bake for 5 minutes.
Stuff the chicken into each taco shell and top with cheese. Bake for 10 minutes, until the cheese has melted.
Add the salsa verde and tamari to the food processor with the jalapeño. Blend until smooth. Stir in the sesame seeds.
Serve each taco with the sesame verde sauce.

nkjaikthrk.name: Crispy Shredded Chicken
preparation: Slice 250g chicken breast into strips add to a bowl and add 1 tbsp light soy, 1 tsp sesame oil 1/4 tsp black pepper. Mix well and marinade for 10-15 minutes.
Slice half a red pepper, slice the spring onions, mince the garlic cloves.
Add 150g cornflour to a bowl.
Make your sauce, add to a bowl and mix well 2 tbsp light soy sauce, 1 tsp dark soy sauce, 2 tbsp honey & 1 tbsp lemon juice.
Add the chicken strips to the cornflour in batches and dredge, shaking off any excess. Pop the coated strips on a plate.

Heat 6 tbsp sunflower oil in a wok or large pan & once hot add the chicken in batches and cook for 3-4 minutes until golden. Remove and put them on a plate lined with kitchen paper. Discard oil and wipe the wok clean.

Heat 1 tbsp oil, add the garlic & stir fry for 30 seconds. Add the red pepper, stir fry for 1 minute. Add the sauce bring to a simmer and add the chicken back in and spring onions. Combine everything together well for 1-2 minutes. Serve over rice and enjoy 😉

nkkkjhgfei.name: BALANCED BIG MAC BOWL
preparation: Slice the potato into chips. Season and drizzle 1/2 tbs olive oil. Cook in the air fryer for approx 15 minutes at 200•C or until cooked.
Heat pan over medium-high heat and add remaining olive oil. Add in onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened.
Add in mince meat, season with salt, pepper, garlic and onion powder. Break apart, and cook until browned.
Assemble your bowl with, lettuce, chips, mince & onion, cheese (melt it) and tomato’s.
In a small bowl, whisk together all sauce ingredients. Then drizzle over the bowl and enjoy!

ingredients.ingredient: Black pepper and sea salt to season

nshnxhlcac.name: Cream Pesto Orzo w/ Salmon
preparation: Place the salmon fillets onto a baking tray with a rack, sprinkle both sides with the fine sea salt and leave in the fridge until ready to cook.
Toast the walnuts in a dry pan until golden brown and fragrant.
Blanch the spinach leaves in boiling water for 20 seconds then cool in an ice bath to stop them cooking. Squeeze out excess moisture once cooled.
#For the pesto
To make the pesto, add the parmesan, basil, walnuts, garlic, spinach, salt and pepper into a blender. Blitz until smooth.
#For the orzo
Add the leeks, butter and oil into a pan. Cook for 5 minutes over a medium-high heat until softened and starting to caramelise.
Add the orzo and stock, bring to a simmer, then cover and cook for 15 minutes on low heat. Add an extra splash of water if needed halfway through.
Once the orzo is cooked, remove from the heat and stir in the pesto. Mix together well.
#For the salmon
Remove salmon from the fridge then pat the skin dry.

Add some oil to a frying pan over a high heat, then lay the salmon in skin side down. Press down on the salmon, turn heat down to medium-high then cook for 5 minutes until crisp and brown. Flip the salmon, sear the flesh for 2 minutes, then set aside.
To serve, add the salmon on top of a bowl of orzo with a dollop of sour cream, freshly chopped dill and some lemon zest and juice. Enjoy!

ingredients.ingredient: Garlic and paprika taco seasoning mix

nvjrnbrbjb.name: Garlic and Paprika Pulled Chicken Taquitos
preparation: In a mixing bowl, add the uncooked chicken, sweet paprika, salt, black pepper and 1 tbsp of olive oil, combine well and bake, air fry or pan fry until chicken is cooked thoroughly.
Once is slightly cooled down, shred or cut into bite size pieces.

Heat 1 tbsp of olive oil in a pan, add the chopped onion and saute for 2-3 min, add the minced garlic and fry for few seconds, then add the tomato passata, water and the garlic and paprika taco seasoning, mix well and simmer for 5-6 min, add the shredded chicken and grated cheese and combine.
Place two large spoonfuls of filling in a line along each tortilla and roll tightly and place seam side down in an oven safe casserole or baking tray. Sprinkle some grated cheese on top.
Bake in pre heated oven(170-180C) until crispy and cheese is melted.
Enjoy !!!

nwqipqkimf.name: Spicy sausage gnocchi traybake
preparation: Add the veggies, gnocchi and sausages to an oven proof dish and coat well in olive oil.
Season with oregano, salt and pepper.
Bake at 180C for 25 minutes.
Stir in the harissa and a little extra oil, add in your kale, then return to the oven for 5 minutes.
Serve with cheese and ENJOY 🤍

ingredients.ingredient: spicy red chili powder or cayenne powder

oeabtkkjbz.name: Butter Chicken
preparation: Cut chicken thighs into bite-size pieces and season with 1 teaspoon salt and red chili powder/cayenne powder.

Sear chicken in 2 tablespoons of butter on high heat for 3 minutes to brown and set aside (do in batches to get best results and avoid overcrowding). Cook 2 minutes less than completely cooked as it will finish cooking in the sauce. You just want a good sear.
In the same pan, add 2 tablespoons butter and sauté onions for 2 minutes. Add ginger garlic paste. Add all seasonings. Cook for 1 minute.
Add tomato sauce and cook until water is absorbed about 5-7 minutes.
Add heavy whipping cream and cook for 2 minutes until thick.
Add in cooked chicken and mix well. Adjust seasoning. Chicken is best served spicy.
Add fenugreek and 2 tablespoons butter. Stir.
Garnish with cilantro.
Serve with naan and rice.

okxzpdqgan.name: BROTHY CHILI GARLIC CHICKEN & RICE
preparation: Add chicken thighs to a bowl along with chili powder, paprika, garlic powder and salt and toss well.
Set aside while making garlic chips.
To make garlic chips, add thinly sliced garlic to 1 cup cold avocado oil in a small skillet over medium heat.
Garlic will gradually begin to fry as the heat of the oil comes up.
Remove garlic chips from the oil just as the garlic begins to turn golden brown to avoid burning.
Set aside on a paper towel lined plate.
Add 2 tbsp olive oil to a large skillet over medium heat.
Add chicken and cook undisturbed on first side for 8 minutes.
Flip and cook an additional 8 minutes on the second side until cooked through and internal temperature hits 165°F.
Remove from pan and set aside.
Deglaze pan with bone broth, scraping the bottom of the pan to release anything that has stuck.
Stir in tamari, coconut milk and lime juice.
To serve, add a scoop of rice to a bowl then top with broth and finish with chicken.
Garnish with garlic chips, green onion, cilantro and sesame seeds.

olbudjkzpi.name: Middle Eastern Kofta Kebabs Wraps
preparation: In a chopper, chop the onions, red and green bell peppers, green chilies, and garlic.
Squeeze out any excess water from the chopped vegetables and discard it.

In a large bowl, combine the vegetable mixture with minced chicken, chili flakes, salt, coriander powder, cumin powder, garam masala, paprika, chili powder, black pepper, tomato paste, coriander and ghee.
Mix well and cover then set in the refrigerator for 1 hour or 24hr for best results.
Form the mixture into kebabs or patties using your hands.
Grill or pan-fry the kebabs over medium heat for about 5-7 minutes on each side, until cooked through and browned.
Enjoy the kebabs hot with pita bread, garlic yogurt sauce, and salad.
In a bowl, combine the diced tomato, cucumber, onion, and chopped coriander.
Add salt, black pepper, and olive oil. Toss gently to mix.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl for the garlic sauce.
Season with salt, black pepper powder and herbs.
Chill for 30 minutes before serving.

ingredients.ingredient: boneless skinless chicken thighs or breasts, thinly sliced
1-2 jalapeños sliced, seeded if you don't like it spicy
1 cup fresh Thai or regular basil chopped

opcmaufbdc.name: Quick Jalapeño Basil Chicken Stir Fry Thai Style
preparation: Cut chicken into thin strips.
Season with corn starch, garlic, ginger, black pepper and turmeric.
In a bowl mix soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, fish sauce and 1/4 cup water. Mix.
In a skillet or pan on medium high heat add oil.
Add bell peppers, jalapeños and shallots. Cook 2 minutes on medium heat.
Add the seasoned chicken and cook for 2-3 minutes to sear. (Add oil if it seems too dry but get a sear on the chicken.
Mix the sauce and add to the chicken. Stir and cook about 8-10 minutes. The sauce will thicken and caramelize.
Remove from the heat.
Add the basil and stir.
Serve over rice and garnish with fresh basil.

osqqzgsvxs.name: Garlic Parmesan Chicken Alfredo Bread
preparation: Pre heat oven at 355 F.
Make the garlic butter by adding softened butter, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper and chili flakes in a bowl. Mix well and set aside.
Season the chicken with the seasoning listed above and cook for 6 minutes each side onto a hot pan or grill.
Once cooked cut into slices.
#For the Alfredo sauce:
Heat butter in a skillet.
Add heavy whipping cream and Parmesan cheese. Stir constantly and add the seasonings.
Keep stirring until the sauce thickens.
Slice the loaf into half.
Spread garlic butter evenly over the open surfaces of the bread.
Top it with Alfredo sauce, followed by mozzarella cheese.
Add the chicken and drizzle some more Alfredo sauce on top garnish with chopped coriander.
Place the bread on a prepared baking dish and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown and crispy.
Serve with Alfredo sauce and enjoy.

ouhzntaihk.name: Black Bean Chilli with Pulled Mushrooms
preparation: Bake the mushrooms – Shred mushrooms, toss with seasonings, and roast at 190C for 20-25 minutes.

Make the chilli – Sauté onion, carrot, pepper, and coriander stems. Add garlic, spices, and tomato paste. Stir in tomatoes, beans, stock, and chipotle paste. Simmer for 20 minutes, then season with lime juice.
Blend the avocado cream – Blitz avocado, yoghurt, lime juice, and coriander leaves until smooth.
Serve – Spoon chilli into bowls, drizzle with avocado cream, top with mushrooms, red chilli, and coriander leaves.

pmywqbtubo.name: Creamy Lemon Garlic Orzo with Salmon
preparation: In a small bowl, combine olive oil, dijon mustard, lemon juice, smoked paprika, and garlic powder. Mix well.
Pour the marinade over your salmon portions and season with salt and pepper. Set aside to marinate for at least 10 minutes.
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat and add a bit of olive oil.
Place the marinated salmon in the pan and cook until it’s about 80% cooked through, about 3-4 minutes per side.
Remove the salmon from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add 2 tbsp olive oil. Sauté the minced garlic and chopped fresh rosemary for about 1 minute, until fragrant.
Add the orzo to the pan and stir to coat in the garlic and rosemary.
Add the chicken bouillon cube and pour in the water. Stir to dissolve the bouillon and bring to a simmer.
Cover the pan with a lid and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the orzo absorbs most of the liquid and is al dente.
Once the orzo is cooked, stir in the heavy cream, butter, red pepper flakes, and fresh parsley.
Add extra water if a more saucy consistency is desired.
If you’re adding cheese, stir in the shredded Gouda and Parmesan (or Pecorino Romano) at this point and adjust salt & pepper to taste.
Place the cooked salmon portions back on top of the orzo.
Squeeze half a lemon over the top of the salmon and orzo.
Cover the pan again and let everything cook on medium heat for another 1-2 minutes, allowing the salmon to finish cooking.
Serve immediately once finished cooking to maintain creamy texture.
Plate the orzo with salmon and garnish with additional fresh parsley and lemon, if desired.

ingredients.ingredient: Flaky salt and pepper for the chicken

pviglhflzk.name: PARGIYOT AND RED RICE
preparation: Preheat the oven to 420F / 220C.
In an oven-safe pan, add all the ingredients except for the chicken and the boiling water.
Mix it all together and spread the rice in one layer.
Add the chicken thighs on top of the rice and season with flaky salt and pepper.
Pour the boiling water and cover with wet parchment paper and aluminum foil.
Transfer to the oven on 420F for 50 minutes.
Remove the cover and pour the red sauce on top of the chicken thighs.
Transfer the oven to convection broil on 450F and broil for 10 more minutes.
Garnish with chopped cilantro.

pvwlearonn.name: BROODJE HETE KIP
preparation: Snij de kipfilet in blokjes en meng die met de olie en specerijen.
Bak de kipfilet op hoog vuur, totdat hij kleurt. Doe dan de paprika in de pan en bak samen nog 5 minuten op middelhoog vuur.
Voeg nu de chilisaus, sojasaus en pindakaas toe en zet het vuur laag. Laat het samen nog 10 minuten zachtjes stoven.
Snijd 4 broodjes open, leg er 'n blaadje sla op en vervolgens de hete kip. Maak af met zoetzure komkommer en ui. Een smakelijk!

ingredients.amount: Fresh herbs (I used mint, parsley and coriander)

pwjhnwzhtm.name: Arayes - Palestinian Meat Pockets
preparation: Grate onion, combine in bowl with meat and spices. Season to taste.
Cut the pita breads in half and pack densely with meat mix.
Brush with olive oil.
Cook in griddle pan (if possible) on low heat, approx. 4-5 mins each side.
Mix Greek yoghurt and herbs for sauce.
Serve. Easy!

pxzdeudhvr.name: Butter Tofu Burrito
preparation: Coat the tofu with the garam masala, salt, olive oil & cornstarch. Bake in the airfryer at 200c for 20 minutes. Flipping halfway through.
Meanwhile sauté the onion in some oil on medium heat until caramelized; about 10 minutes.
Add the tomato paste, garlic & ginger. Stir until fragrant.
Add the spices and a little bit of the soy cream. Toast for 1 minute. Add it to a blender cup along with the rest of the cream and blend until smooth.
Return the sauce to the pan and add the tofu.
Assemble the burrito’s and ENJOY!

ingredients.ingredient: Chinese Chives (also known as garlic chives)

pydvulklks.name: Healthy Shrimp and Chive Rice Paper Dumplings
preparation: Preheat oven to 400F convection (if you have it, no worries if not); mix together the ingredients for the sauce and set aside
Add the shrimp, garlic, Chinese chives, ginger, cornstarch, salt, pepper, sesame oil, and soy sauce to a bowl and mix

Fill up a large bowl (or pie dish) with water and place two damp paper towels on a cutting board; soak the rice paper wrapper in water for ~15 seconds (don't leave it in too long bc it will continue to soften as you work) and place on the paper towel
Cut the rice paper in half down the middle, break it in two pieces, and put 1 Tbsp of the shrimp mixture in the middle of each piece
Fold the sides of the rice paper over to filling (it will create a triangle shape) then flip the dumpling over and fold the excess rice paper onto the other side
Drizzle a baking sheet with 2 Tbsp avocado oil and add the dumplings; roll each dumpling in oil on both sides as you place them on the baking sheet

Convection bake for 13-15 mins until shrimp is pink and bottoms of the dumplings are golden brown (if you don’t have convection you may need to cook 3-5 mins longer), then broil 2-3 mins until tops of the dumplings are golden brown (watch closely while you broil because the dumplings can burn easily)
Serve with sauce and enjoy!

pyqpzsntgf.name: Marry Me Chickpeas (With Creamy Tuscan Sauce)
preparation: #Instructions
Flavor Base: Heat 2 Tbsp unsalted butter, 4 cloves garlic, ½ tsp each salt, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, and ¼ tsp ground black pepper in a large saute pan or pot over medium heat.
Cook for about 2 minutes, until garlic is fragrant.
#Fillings
Stir in ½ cup sun-dried tomatoes, 1 cup vegetable broth, and 2 15-oz cans chickpeas.
Continue cooking on medium, uncovered, for 5 minutes.
#Finish
Remove from heat.
Stir in 1 cup heavy cream, ½ cup grated parmesan, and 2 Tbsp chopped fresh basil.
Serve warm with crusty bread.

qkmkxeqslb.name: Beef Short Rib Pappardelle
preparation: 1. Heat the oil in a casserole over a high heat. Pat the short ribs dry and season all over with salt and pepper. Brown the ribs in two batches for 8-10 minutes, tuning every 2-3 minutes until golden. Remove from the pan.

2. Reduce the heat to medium. Chuck the onion, carrot and celery into the pan. Season with plenty of salt and pepper and mix well. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 8-10 minutes or until everything is soft.

3. Add the garlic to the pan. Mix well and cook, stirring occasionally, for a minute until fragrant. Then add the tomato puree, paprika, thyme, tomatoes, stock and red wine. Mix well and bring to the boil. Return the ribs to the pan. Cover, reduce the heat to low and cook for 3 ½ - 4 hours or until the meat falls off the bone.
4. Remove the ribs from the sauce and leave to cool slightly. Remove and discard the fat, bone and sinew. Shred the meat and cover.

5. Meanwhile, leave the sauce, bubbling gently without the lid to reduce by half. It will take 50-60 minutes. Add the meat and mix well. Do a final seasoning check and you are done. Remove a third of the sauce for leftovers.
6. Cook the pasta until al dente in a large pan of boiling salted water. Drain and add to the ragu. Mix well and serve with plenty of Parm.

qntwfjcizj.name: EASY MEDITERRANEAN GRILLED COD
preparation: Preheat the oven to 420F / 220C.
Place the cod fillets in the center of a baking pan with parchment paper.
Arrange all the veggies and fresh basil around the fish.
Add the lemongrass on top of the veggies.
Sprinkle the spices mix on top of the fish and the vegetables.
Drizzle olive oil, date syrup and lemon juice on the fish.
Massage the fish with your hands to make sure everything is covered with the spices.
Bake it on 420F for 25 minutes.
Transfer to convection broil on 450F for 7-8 minutes to get a nice golden brown color.
Remove the lemongrass and serve!

ingredients.ingredient: Any Grated cheese( I used cheddar)

quewijvaew.name: Bolognese Tacos
preparation: Heat a 1/2 tbsp olive oil in a pan, add the chopped onion and cook until soft, add the  beef mince(ground beed) and brown over high heat for 5-6 min, add the chopped garlic, fry for 30-40 second, add the grated carrots, tomato sauce, seasonings, salt, vegetable stock cube and the water, combine and cover the pan with a lid and simmer for 15-20 min.

Dip each tortilla wrap in the bolognese sauce, place in a pre heated pan, add grated cheese on the tortilla wraps, add 2-3 tbsp bolognese taco mix, more grated cheese, fold the tortilla wraps and grill on each side for few min on medium heat until slightly browned.

rdunorubdi.name: Pulled Chicken Sandwich
preparation: Use the mustard as a binder and coat the chicken with a dry rub.
Add the chicken to an oven proof tray and top it with foil.
Place it in the oven at 120 degrees Celsius for 3 hours.
Pull the chicken.
Slice all the greens for the coleslaw, add to a bowl, add all other ingredients and mix to combine.

ingredients.ingredient: Homemade burger sauce (47cals): 3 tbsp light mayo, 1 1/2 tbsp tomato ketchup, 1/2 tsp mustard, black pepper & 1-2 tsp gherkin juice.

rsuqzrbohe.name: Cheeseburger Burrito
preparation: Fry the beef mince in low calorie spray for 3-4 mins, then add the tomato purée, mustard, crumble over the beef stock cube and a dash of boiling water mixing well.
Let it cool slightly then heat up the wrap in the microwave for 10 seconds.
Assemble the burrito as shown in the video, roll, spray with low calorie spray and air fry on 190C for 3-5 mins.
Add your optional burger sauce and enjoy!

ingredients.ingredient: #For the Crispy Black Bean and Cheese Tacos:

rwulwhpmgh.name: Crispy Black Bean and Cheese Tacos
preparation: Preheat your oven to 425F and line an extra large baking sheet or 2 normal-sized baking sheets with parchment paper. Set aside.
Bring a large pan to medium heat. Once hot, add oil. Then, add onion and cauliflower rice. Season with kosher salt. Sauté, stirring occasionally, for about 4-5 minutes.
Add in garlic and remaining spices and let cook for 1 more minute.
Next, add in black beans, lentils, broth or water, and lime juice + zest. Stir to combine. Taste and adjust the amount of salt and cayenne to your preference.
Then, allow it to cook for 3 more minutes, stirring occasionally.
Start smushing the beans and lentils with the back of your spatula or a potato masher. They don't have to all be mashed. Remove the pan from the heat and set aside.
Add corn tortillas to your baking sheet(s) and spray each side lightly with cooking oil. Then, transfer to the preheated oven to cook for 3 minutes.
Add a thin layer of cheese to one half of each tortilla. Then, layer on a large spoonful of the black bean and lentil mixture – you may have some extra, depending how heavily you fill them.
Finally, add another thin layer of cheese on top. Fold the tortillas in half and press down firmly on the tortilla so that it stays closed.
Transfer baking sheet(s) to the oven for 12 minutes, then gently flip the tacos and cook for another 12 minutes, or until crispy.
While the tacos are baking, add all of the cilantro lime crema ingredients to a small food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
Allow the tacos to cool for several minutes before dipping in the cilantro lime crema.

rxtihigatj.name: Beef ho fun
preparation: Cut thin slices of beef
Coat beef slices in ingredients and set aside for 10 minutes (or ideally 30 if you have time!)
Cut all your other ingredients to size
If you have dried rice noodles, cook them per packet instructions and rinse once cooked
Fry in a wok or a large fry pan on high heat the beef with a bit of high-fry oil
Set aside beef once browned
Add all other stir fry ingredients and cook for 2 minutes
Add the noodles
Add all sauces to a bowl and then into the stir fry and coat the noodles until brown colour
Add the beef back in and cook for 2 minutes
Serve hot & fresh

sfjabjkkxw.name: BEEF & MUSHROOM WONTONS w/ chilli oil sauce
preparation: Place all the dumpling filling ingredients in a bowl and combine.
Place your wonton wrappers on a clean surface and add a heaped tsp of the filling into the centre of each wrapper.
Brush the edges with water. Then cup the wonton and scrunch up at the top, pinching and sealing to form a comet-like shape.
Repeat and set aside under a damp cloth.
Get a pan of boiling water on the boil and then simmer the dumplings for 7-8 minutes.
Meanwhile combine the sauce ingredients in a bowl.
When the dumps are cooked, scoop them out and place them in a bowl, drown in the sauce and top with more spring onions.
Enjoy!!

ingredients.ingredient: onion, grated and moister squeezed out

sjplclbxly.name: 5 Freezer Friendly Chicken Marinade Recipes
preparation: Blend all ingredients together in a blender and combine with chicken thighs to marinade.
#For each separate marinade
Add all ingredients into a bowl.
Mix together and add your chicken thighs.
You can cut them up into bite size pieces or leave as is.
Mix well and place in ziplock baggy, making sure all of the air is out.
If you are placing in the freezer, you can freeze for up to 2 months.
Once you want to take out of freezer to eat, let defrost in the fridge 24 hours before you cook the chicken.
ENJOY!

spjklxxhot.name: Pizza salad with garlic herb dressing
preparation: Preheat your air fryer or oven to 200°C fan.
Toss the diced aubergine, cherry tomatoes, red pepper and pepperoni with oregano, garlic granules and a good pinch of salt.
Spread into your air fryer basket or onto a baking tray.
Roast for 12–15 minutes in the air fryer or 18–20 minutes in the oven, until softened, sticky and slightly caramelised.
Scatter the diced sourdough and a little grating of parmesan over the top.
Return to roast for another 4–5 minutes until the croutons are crisp and golden.
